name: Billionaire Defense Kit
description:
You are the liberal party of Australia and it's your job to protect the things you care about most.

That's right, the billionairres.

As potential legislation and facts start raining down, it's your job to shoot them right out of the sky before they land. For every piece of legislation you shoot down you'll recieve a gratuitous donation directly into your bank account. 

Use these funds to upgrade your weapons and keeep your life lines alive through all eight levels!
